ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Destroy this: Deal 4 damage as you choose to any players or monsters. (ACTIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
+1 Heart.

If you would die, destroy this. Prevent your death and end your turn. (PASSIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Each time another player takes damage, you may heal them for 1 Heart. (PASSIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Before you attack the monster deck, look at the top card. You may discard it and end your attack. (PASSIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: Each time another player gains a soul, look at the top 10 cards of the discard pile of the loot deck. Add one to your hand. (PASSIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description: $: Destroy any 2 trinkets in play: Gain +1 Treasure. (ACTIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
$: Discard 3 loot: Gain +1 Treasure.

$: Destroy an item you own: Loot 2. (ACTIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
At the start of your turn, expand the number of acdtive monsters by 1.

At the end of your turn, remove an active monster pile and discard all monsters in that pile. (PASSIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: CardCustom
ContainedObjects.Description:
Roll:

1-3: Halve the activated effect of any item in play (rounded down).
4-6: Double the activated effect of any item in play. (ACTIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Deactivate any number of items you own, then recharge that many items in play

When anyone rolls a 3, recharge this. (ACTIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
When you gain this, reveal cards off the top of the loot deck till you reveal a trinket, then play it.

Each time you play a trinket, loot 2. (PASSIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Discard a monster that is being revealed.

When a monster dies, recharge this. (ACTIVE)

ContainedObjects.Name: Card
ContainedObjects.Description:
Each time a player buys an item, roll:

1-2: Look at the top card of the treasure deck.
3-4: Loot 2.
5-6: Gain 4￠. (PASSIVE)
